actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of State and the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of settling Indochinese refugees in territories and possessions in the Pacific which the United States administers or over which the United States claims sovereignty.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State and the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of settling Indochinese refugees in territories and possessions in the Pacific which the United States administers or over which the United States claims sovereignty, with particular attention to the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of State and the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of settling Indochinese refugees in territories and possessions in the Pacific which the United States administers or over which the United States claims sovereignty.
